title: Quilt, ca. 1800
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: block printed on plain weave; three reds, blue, yellow, lavender and black
dimensions:
A. Warp: 26.5cm (10 3/8in.). Weft: (selvage on right) 33.5cm (13 1/8in.)
B. Warp: 31.5cm (12 3/8in.). Weft: (selvage on right) 30cm  (10 3/4in.).
description: Twp triangular pieces cut from what was once two different square quilt centers. Placing one piece on top of the other will give 3/4ths of the original pattern.

tombstone.epitaph:
Quilt, ca. 1800.
ca. 1800. Medium: cotton
Technique: block printed on plain weave; three reds, blue, yellow, lavender and black. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-269-a,b.
